EmailTemplate.subject: NCS is over....what next?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on completing NCS with The Challenge, we hope you enjoyed your summer as much as we did.
You are now part of The Challenge Society which will help you continue your NCS journey developing yourself further and meeting old NCS friends. We will send you an email every month with exciting opportunities just for NCS grads.
If you have any questions or want more info email us on tcs.westmidlands@the-challenge.org or drop me a text on 07785627463.
Have a great day,
Liam (Midlands NCS Grad Team)
